headline: Dow Inc. (DOW): A High-Yield Dividend Stock in the Materials Sector
summary: Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) is included among the 10 Highest Dividend-Paying Stocks to Buy in the S&P 500. Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) is the producer of polyethylene and other commodity chemicals that are used as raw materials in packaging and consumer product industries. Meanwhile, the company has faced pressure in recent years from rising US interest rates and growing […]
